metadata.name: WScript or CScript Dropper - File
metadata.comment: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe'))) AND (startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\programdata'))) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.jse')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.vbe')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.js')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.vba')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.vbs'))))

output.summary: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe

metadata.objective: Examine fields: actor.process.name, file.path False positive: Unknown Reference: WScript or CScript Dropper (cea72823-df4d-4567-950c-0b579eaf0846)
